response.original_title: Angela Allen Documentary - A Short Taster
response.overview: A brief preview of a documentary dedicated to the extraordinary life and career of Angela Allen, the renowned 'script girl' for masterpieces such as The Third Man, The African Queen, and The Misfits, featuring excerpts from films and rare archival materials, along with photographs from her personal collection.
response.title: Angela Allen Documentary - A Short Taster
